## InteractionCommandRequest class

Command request data from an interaction.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class InteractionCommandRequest<CommandType extends Command | ContextMenuCommand, InteractionType extends CommandInteraction> extends CommandRequest<InteractionType extends CommandInteraction<InGuildCacheType> ? true : false, InteractionCommandResponse> 
```

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `InteractionCommandRequest` class.

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [deferReply(ephemeral)](./noisecord.interactioncommandrequest.deferreply.md) |  | Defers the reply, if possible. |
|  [followUpForce(options)](./noisecord.interactioncommandrequest.followupforce.md) |  | Sends a follow up message. If interaction is not replied to fully, throws an error. |
